userUtterance.text: Come up with a trivia about Sustainable Development Goal 5

value.query: What is the goal of Sustainable Development Goal 5?

value.answer: Goal 5 of the Sustainable Development Goals is to achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.

agentUtterance.text: {"question": "What is the goal of Sustainable Development Goal 5?", "choices": [{"choice": "End poverty in all its forms everywhere", "correct": false}, {"choice": "End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture", "correct": false}, {"choice": "Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages", "correct": false}, {"choice": "Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls", "correct": true}], "hints": [{"hint_type": "basic", "hint": "The goal of Sustainable Development Goal 5 is to address a fundamental issue that affects half of the world's population."}, {"hint_type": "specific", "hint": "The goal of Sustainable Development Goal 5 is to ensure that everyone has equal rights and opportunities, regardless of their gender."}, {"hint_type": "source", "hint": "The information for the right answer can be found in the Sustainable Development Goals 2021 Progress Chart."}, {"hint_type": "source_part", "hint": "The solution can be found in the section on Sustainable Development Goal 5."}]}
